name: schedule_test_01
description:
Uses 6 dimmable, 1 CCT, 4 PLC, and 2 EnOcean devices to test a variety of absolute schedule items with the pre-built scenes.

Test will add the items then adjust the virtual time to check that all fixtures have adjusted to the appropriate level per the schedule item. 

Also testing Daily, Weekly and onetime events.

requests.name: Set Virtual Time
Set Virtual Time
Add Schedule Item
requests.tests: //tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;

requests.name: Get Status
Get Status
Get Status
Delete All Schedule Items
requests.tests: tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;
